document.paragraph:
magnify.png MAGNIFY
2Compiling
To compile the example:
Start Visual Studio .NET
Choose Open Project from the File menu.
Navigate to <EiffelEnvision_installation_path>\envision\examples\wel\magnify\ and select magnify_demo.eifp
Clicking open loads the selected project
Launch EiffelStudio.
Click Add project
Browse to $ISE_EIFFEL\examples\wel\magnify\.
Choose magnify.ecf
Choose the location where the project will be compiled, by default the same directory containing the configuration file.
Click OK.
2Running After launching the application, you will see a window displayed with a similar appearance to the one above. Selecting "Quick reference..." from the "Help" menu will display the full instructions for using this application.
2Under the Hood
In order to be able to control the output of the sample, MAIN_WINDOW redefines many features from ../../reference/windows/wel_frame_window_chart.xmlWEL_FRAME_WINDOW. The feature draw_zoom_rectangle is used to display the output and on_menu_command handles the notifications sent to the window when a menu_selection has been made. This sample contains the following classes:
APPLICATION_IDS
MAIN_WINDOW
MAGNIFY_DEMO
